fields_of_interest: Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Public Health
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Member of Coalition Internationale SIDA (Coalition Plus) 
Member of AIDS Action Europe 
Representative of Coalition Plus on the EU CSF on Drugs 
Portuguese representative on the EU CSF on HIV/AIDS 
Member of the National Civil Society Forum for HIV/AIDS, TB and viral hepatitis
legal_status: Non for profit, Private Institution of social Solidarity (IPSS)
goals__remit:
Our main objective is to promote the access to the best available healthcare and treatment for People Living with HIV and related infections, as well as their quality of life. 
We also aim to contribute for prevention, early diagnostics and linkage to care of PLHIV and related infections, especially among key affected groups, and to promote their participation in both policy and decision making, and in project implementation.
